scripts.build:lcu: ng build lcu --prod --single-bundle && npm run pack
scripts.demo: npm run build:common && npm run start:demo
scripts.demo:lcu: npm run build:common && npm run build:lcu && npm run start:demo
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && npm run deploy:lcu && npm run deploy:demo && npm run deploy:billing
scripts.deploy:billing: npm version patch --prefix projects/billing && npm run build:billing && npm publish ./dist/billing --access public
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && npm run build:common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:demo: npm version patch --prefix projects/demo && npm run build:demo && npm publish ./dist/demo --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu && npm run build:lcu && npm publish ./dist/lcu --access public
scripts.pack:lcu: rimraf dist/lcu/wc && mkdirp dist/lcu/wc && npm run pack:main && npm run pack:pollyfills && npm run pack:join && npm run pack:styles
scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:lcu
